text: @IvankaTrump You are tone-deaf! 130K Americans are dead / 25MM are unemployed - most people can’t afford to pay their bills and you post a picture of a horse. Why don’t you go visit a COVID-19 ward? Or volunteer at a soup kitchen / food pantry? Or just keep mum and stop w/ your BS counsel.
